website_summaries.verdict: The curved, ultra-wide Asus ProArt PA34VC is a good choice as a monitor for creative professionals. It also touts gaming features such as a 100Hz refresh rate and support for AMD's FreeSync adaptive-sync technology.
pros: Ultra-wide screen with 100Hz refresh rate, 1900R curvature, and HDR support
cons: Does not cover the full Adobe RGB color space

customer_reviews.title: Broke 6 months after warranty expiration
customer_reviews.text: My monitor started showing these vertical lines 6 months after the warranty expired. Though it was out of warranty, I still thought that ASUS might help me figure out what went wrong and if it was fixable. But as it was out of warranty they felt that their obligation to me had ended, and apparently feel no obligation to the environment, so they weren't interested. Any large reputable dealer has a repair centre, where repairs are free when in warranty and charged outside the warranty. The fact that ASUS won't repair their own products shows either a lack of faith in their products or complete contempt for the environment. Probably both.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: About what I would expect from ASUS
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace its "little brother" that was getting a bit old and had started (after nearly 10 years) to develop a couple of minor faults. Hung off my 27" iMac 5k as second screen, using Display Port for connection leaving HDMI free to connect laptop if needed. 27" screen is bright, colour matching exceptional (proved just how far the old screen had drifted - and how mediocre Apple's 27" 5k panel is). Superb detail, no obvious delay, excellent for photo/video editing al the way down to watching TV from streaming apps. Is it expensive? Yes - but you get what you pay for. Would I buy another? Of course.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Monitor Recommendation
customer_reviews.text: I have given an excellent review rating as the monitor works well within my computer system as a photographer and graphic designer. My budget was limited so the 4k was out of my reach. After reading many other reviews and computer magazine articles online as to what would suit my needs and workflow this one came out on quality and price. The colour calibration on the screen is excellent, making scanned images and design artwork much easier to process. So finally from my personal view point, based on my experience these past few weeks of constant use it has proved to be a valuable addition to my workplace.
customer_reviews.author: matylda

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: This monitor seemed to have most of the requirements we desired for photo editing. We are using it with a newly-acquired Windows 10 PC. They appear to be a good match. There was little, if any, change after calibration so it looks as though the monitor was well set up initially. We are not experts, but there seems to be little, if any, colour or brightness variation between centre and edge. So far, we would recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: paulmac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent colour fidelity
customer_reviews.text: After getting a set of high gloss and matte coloured RGB c-type prints back from the print shop I scrutinised them against the screen. No discernible difference at all. Awesome. If you take the time to calibrate this monitor and know what you’re doing with your colour management and use a print supplier who produces dependable results, then this monitor delivers. Highly recommended. I took a punt buying it, but have no regrets at all.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: A worthwhile upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: A very good upgrade to the previous monitor. My daughter is big into digital art and I decided to replace the previous monitor. The difference in the screen quality is very much better and the 1920x1200 screen is a nice ratio to use. Overall it is solidly made and the screen can be easily adjusted to suit viewing angle. I certainly don't regret the purchase and I feel the price of £340 is well justified.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: EPIC Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Really good - sure it's not 4k, but 27inch works perfectly with 1440p. Great with Mac and PC - I use both on it. Connectivity is fantastic, pretty much works with anything. Super slim bezel which doesn't even have a logo on it. Looks cool on my ergotron LX. Beautiful colours, matt screen, flicker free.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceBoy

customer_reviews.title: Since then it has performed flawlessly and has rendered colours brilliantly. I do a monthly (or thereabouts) calibration with ..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor for photo editing in July 2012. Since then it has performed flawlessly and has rendered colours brilliantly. I do a monthly (or thereabouts) calibration with Spyder Elite 4 and, although it drifts a wee bit in that time, it's never a huge amount. Strong recommendation to all photographers looking for a decent monitor which is damn near NEC/EIZO class for a fraction of the cost. The USB3 ports on the side are an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: parkylondon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen
customer_reviews.text: As a photographer and videographer, I need 100% accuracy in colour editing and this screen really delivers. The menu system takes some getting used to and at first is frustrating, but once you know what to set it to it really takes your editing to another level. 32 inches is perfect for 4k resolution in my opinion. Make sure you have a graphics card that can handle 4k 60hz.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Lau

customer_reviews.title: good price but dead pixel
customer_reviews.text: happy with the monitor except there is a dead pixel right in the middle which I keep trying to photoshop out of my images... Asus insists that up to 3 dead pixels is acceptable, I'd expect better at this price
customer_reviews.author: Dingle

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the Benq I returned
customer_reviews.text: Another monitor from Bora that has a lot of IPS glow Those at Asus that suppose to have passed my monitor should have an eyesight test. The IPS glow is in both bottom corners. Not as good as the Benq I returned, I'm putting up with this one for the time being. Not worth the price for the amount of glow.
customer_reviews.author: Paul-Lancs

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these monitors connected to my 2014 MacBook Pro 13 inch. Used HDMI on one screen and the displayport on the other. I purchased the first monitor a couple of years ago. I have been impressed with it so I got another one. One downside of having this setup is that the USB ports on the edge of the right monitor can not be used as the left monitor blocks them. This is only a minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B

customer_reviews.title: Superb monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Superb monitor. There isn't a single thing I can find fault with. Colour reproduction is perfect. Clarity and sharpness is just awesome, I don't see how it can get any better. Set up was easy, manoeuvrability on the stand is slick and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Spent quite a lot of time reading the reviews for various Monitors, and this one was one of the best. I'm really pleased with it. The picture quality is excellent. I use it connected to a laptop, to edit photos, as the colour quality is much better on the monitor. Really easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Karanszia

customer_reviews.title: Impressed by the quality. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m graphic designer and I need the monitor with accurate colour. So far, I’m impressed with the colour it has been presented. Love the adjustable function that allow you to change the hight of the monitor according to your sitting positions. The usb hub also give enough ports for my other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent UHD monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this high quality monitor. Setup was no problem and the image quality is fantastic. It's always a worry when spending a lot of money on a monitor, but having used if for several weeks, I now cannot imagine how I managed without it - so no regrets at all. My previous (23 inch HD) monitor is now on a different computer and feels so small and low res when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor, re-calibrated it using a Spyder5 and it was almost the same not enough difference to matter from factory settings.
customer_reviews.author: Hryzko

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality monitor with several options for connecting to PC. Colours render well, making photo-editing so much easier. 4 USB3 sockets in the side are also very handy (and fast) to the extent I now seem to have a spare USB hub! Very fast service from Amazon as well
customer_reviews.author: R. Alsop

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant for photography!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is perfect for the amateur photographer. Crystal clear screen. Very sturdy! Easy to pivot and swivel. 1920x1200 is perfect for viewing photos and video.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Fab performance
customer_reviews.text: I have two on my gaming pc and on on my Mac Pro. Amazing resolution and colour performance on both systems. Very reliable and excellent connectivity. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: This is a great monitor with lots of good and useful features and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor with lots of good and useful features and excellent for editing photos on which is the purpose i bought it for.It might be a tad expensive but then you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kimalataz

customer_reviews.title: Well it is a lot of money. On a ...
customer_reviews.text: Well it is a lot of money. On a positive my spyder pro did not change the calibration except for brightness which is to be expected. On a negative, if you want to wall mount it the be prepared for a lot of faf. I think the holes on the back to mount a third party wall mount are totally inadequate. Ok if you have a very deep desk and can leave it on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: VGB ltd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy! Great monitor for working with photographs. No need to pay way over the odds for a top quality product, this is top quality at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Techyjock

customer_reviews.title: Very nice indeed
customer_reviews.text: What can i say, amazing colors, good quality materials. Shame is so expensive but hey....you pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: S. Flinia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for professionals
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor for professionals. Good size offering a lot of space for editing two side by side word documents. I also like the picture in picture feature.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Jirasek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen as it enables me to work on digital photographs with excellent detail. Easy to set up. It has numerous features which I have yet to make myself familiar but I am impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: sandra robertson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent screen for all levels of photographic work.
customer_reviews.text: Well packed , arrived safely . Worked straight out of the box. First print dictated a reset to match profiles of printer to paper , no problem with the excellent screen controls.
customer_reviews.author: sweeper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: As a professional photographer I needed a good quality monitor for picture editing. I found it with this, great quality and colours. Used as a second monitor connected to a Apple iMac.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: High quality professional monitor at affordable price! Very happy for buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Boopathy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is the best monitor I have ever owned. I use it for Photo Editing. The colours are rich and accurate to what I have shot. I am delighted with it!
customer_reviews.author: Listen Ear

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor with beautiful colours
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor with beautiful colours, a lot of HDMI ports and an overall quality beyond my expectations. Contains also one HDMI cable and two display port cables plus UK and EUR power cables. Delivered the next day before 1pm without any troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Like looking at the world with different eyes...it's crisp, clear, lifelike. Makes my photo editing so much easier...worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Cazzy2501

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor under £1500
customer_reviews.text: Everything fantastic so far. Just about to try the photographic quality with photoshop etc.
customer_reviews.author: michael crow

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for viewing photographs
customer_reviews.text: This screen is amazing. Not too big, fits nicely on my desk and is even pre-calibrated. Ideal for viewing photographs
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor... only wished it wasn't so expensive because I could do with two of them!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: best I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb screen, best I have ever had. Expensive but worth the price. The original screen delivered by SCAN computers had a fault, but was easily and rapidly replaced by SCAN. Delivery by DPD was excellent, and I wish other companies would use delivery services as good as these.
customer_reviews.author: Lark Associates

customer_reviews.title: Asus PA248QJ A great monitor for photographic editing
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this item does exactly what is says on the box, the only down side was the missing support CD and warranty card which neither Amazon or Asus have been unable to resolve both saying the other is responsible for these two items but this is only a minor grip about a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: d f hayward

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect did the job very well Thanks for speedy delivery
customer_reviews.author: Lisbon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display, Great flexibility with the pivot
customer_reviews.text: Pos. Beautiful display, Great flexibility with the pivot, rotate and hight adjustable stand. Clear menu system and great connectivity. Neg I have been using an external hard drive through the built in usb hub, if the monitor sleeps the hard drive will disconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Jake McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says on the box. Highly recommended. I callibrated it with my spyder - old one!
customer_reviews.author: Damien C.

customer_reviews.title: Colour is superb but occasionally it starts flickering black using ...
customer_reviews.text: Colour is superb but occasionally it starts flickering black using the HDMI cable with a Radeon HD7700 have not figured why it is doing it mainly used for photography any help on sorting this would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: SnowinSummer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm a wedding photographer and this screen is perfect for post-production work, no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Packed well. Incredible picture - does what it says. And a good price.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for my video editing
customer_reviews.text: Got it a few days ago.Works fine for my video editing.True colors.
customer_reviews.author: Heligars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, solid, adjustable and very well made for the price with lovely clarity of picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ropie

customer_reviews.title: Great for photographers use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really fast delivery. Screen great for editing my photos! Colours great & looks the same from any angle..
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for the first time I have a monitor I can trust 5 star
customer_reviews.author: colin lees

customer_reviews.title: Asus PA248Q 24.1 inch Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this item. Rather more facilities than I'm likely to need but easy to install and no problems setting up. As some other reviewers have said, the picture is rather bright, but I soon became used to it. I've not done much Photoshop work with it yet but spent several hours virtual flying and viewing many scenery items that I formerly didn't know existed. A quality product, very flexible in usability and for my money, it is worth the extra cost.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Norfolk

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The monitor replaced a 10 year old Dell 24" 1920x1200 pixel monitor that cost £700 when new. The Asus was £170 from Amazon Warehouseand shows how much hardware prices have dropped. There is some backlight bleed through in the bottom right of the screen on start-up with the BIOS pages, but this is not going to affect my use. Colour quality is excellent; I might buy another one if it is available at a similar price.
customer_reviews.author: sc paul

customer_reviews.title: More expensive than my two Samsung monitors, no better
customer_reviews.text: Side by side with my two Samsung S24A650 monitors it is clear that the colour brightness of this monitor is worse. Also it is not possible to get a bright white (very easy to see when using spreadsheets that stretch across the Asus and Samsung monitors at the same time). I have tried to adjust colour settings / brightness / temperature etc but impossible to get a pure white. Otherwise, solid build and finish..
customer_reviews.author: Erik U

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is such a step up from my old monitor, fantastic for my photography as the colours are spot on , i also bought an Eizo and the colours match perfectly .I dont use it to its full potential for graphics and such like so can only say for photography its superb
customer_reviews.author: Kizzy

customer_reviews.title: Asus PA248Q
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor with many features that are very useful and easy to use, a variety of display options for connecting to PC and the USB hub is also very handy. Can be used 'straight out of the box' with great results. Would recommend this monitor without hesitation to anyone who wants one better than the standard ones avaliable, the best one I've had, and that's been a few, well worth the extra outlay.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant in every way!
customer_reviews.text: It's not cheap, but does the job with total satisfaction. Also has the advantage of 4 USB ports which come in very handy. Extra convenience for turning off keyboard, mouse and back-up devices by just closing down the monitor..
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: ASUS Pa248Q IPS Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this monitor and would recommend it to anyone working with graphics/photography. Good clear image from all angles and to easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: Alfie G McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor, disappointed no HDMI lead enclosed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor, It cost 3 times the amount I spent on a monitor last time and so I was little worried, however the quality is outstanding, so much so that I realised some of my old work on photoshop was of a poor standard but it had looked adequate previously. I was however disappointed that no HDMI lead was enclosed, various leads I've never heard of and have no connection for on the computer were enclosed but I had to use the old fashioned clumsy screw in one when an HDMI would have been so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Style

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor
customer_reviews.text: It's a great IPS monitor. The picture is crystal clear. The set up is fast and straightforward. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Dariusz

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what is says
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, used exclusively for Adobe Lightroom work and makes editing a lot more enjoyable and easier. Occasionly watch films on it too.
customer_reviews.author: R C Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality overall but the monitor arrived with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered direct from Amazon. Great picture quality overall but the monitor arrived with a large piece of what I think is dirt sandwiched behind the panel and the back light. Totally distracting, even standing 6 feet away. Poor quality control on the part of ASUS. Let's hope the replacement is a keeper. Amazon unfortunately don't seem to be in any rush to actually ship a replacement to me. Not a great experience and I am unlikely to keep if the replacement is of a similar sub standard quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good monitor. Very pleased with it. Picture is very good. No dead pixels etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brightfusion Ltd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Thought I might care about the thin red stripe at the bottom but I don't (the light of the screen means you can't really see it anyway), and in every other way it is pretty flawless. Looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: aemchops

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive high quality monitor.
customer_reviews.text: As a photographer I wanted an additional monitor that would give great results. For the price this was better than I hoped. Great temperature and colour control with stunning resolution. I would recomend it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worth single penny spent on it
customer_reviews.text: Extremely vivid colours and low backlight bleeding are amongst many pros of this monitor. Its 16:10 aspect ratio makes internet browsing pleasurable and with connection to my TV box through another one of the inputs, I can watch BR films and HD channels without quality loss. USB 3.0 connectors are a perfect extension to existing ports and help keeping my desk tidy.
customer_reviews.author: yessoos

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor = better working environment = more productive and no more bending my head around for a good viewing angle!
customer_reviews.author: Duncan South

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I dithered between buying the Asus or the Dell. Both are the same core screen but with different frames, connectors etc. I am pleased to say this is a splendid screen that was very easy to set up and use. It has loads of connectors and you can even use it as a USB 3 hub. It comes with all the connector cables except HDMI. I am particularly impressed with the stand. It comes connected to the screen, is easily adjustable for height and you can rotate the screen to portrait mode if you want. I chose this for photo editing and it is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited nearly a year (from Computex 2014) to get my hands on one of these....and I'm glad I did! I've been using it for about 3 weeks now and it's an absolute joy. This thing has inputs galore (1x HDMI 2.0, 2x HDMI 1.4, Mini DP, DP, and a 4x USB 3.0 hub) - so I can run pretty much all my devices from it (Xbox One etc) The ultra-thin bezels are great whilst the colour accuracy, image and build quality are of the highest order. There are cheaper monitors available, but for those looking for a premium 32' monitor I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Alston

customer_reviews.title: Mini DisplayPort to DisplayPort Adapter Cable
customer_reviews.text: the reason I rated it 4 is because the Mini DisplayPort to DisplayPort Adapter Cable did not come with the monitor, although all the other cables were included!!! now I need to purchase it separately and spend more. this item was delivered by city Link. The delivery was careless; no one rang our bell to let us know it was delivered, we just saw the city link van leaving, and when we opened the door there it was...the item was delivered outside our door, without asking for signature nor notifying us! This is a careless way to deliver an item especially that it's an expensive one. We'll unpack now and if there is any damage will definitely return it back.
customer_reviews.author: ThaerZ

customer_reviews.title: Not so good. I'm not 100% happy I have this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Asus is doing very good quality monitor for really good price. Plastic , buttons and rest is awesome. But I'm afraid main thing in this monitor is rubbish "Screen", It's LG low quality screen with heavy AG and terrible back light !! one of the worst I have seen.Still better then any of monitors for price less them 200 punds but I was expecting more. Colours are great design as well but screen is not worth 300 punds.
customer_reviews.author: BGL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for photo editing
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and to set for color quality, excellent screen and color, ideal for editing images and ensuring good quality prints
customer_reviews.author: C.J.Lockyer

product_meta.title: ASUS ProArt Curved PA34VC 34 Inch Professional Monitor, UWQHD (3440 x 1440), IPS, 100% sRGB, △E< 2, 3 side-frameless, Thunderbolt 3, USB Type-C, HDR
product_meta.description: Style Name:100% sRGB| Size Name:34 Inch HDR Curved USB-CASUS ProArt Curved PA34VC 34-inch professional monitor, UWQHD (3440x1440), IPS, 100%sRGB, △E< 2, 3 side-frameless, Thunderbolt 3, USB Type C, HDR. UK Power Supply.
feature_bullets: 34.1 Inch UWQHD 1900R IPS display with frameless design
100 Percent of sRGB colour gamut, pre-calibrated for high color accuracy
HDR-10 compatible makes it possible to create more dynamic and realistic images
Thunderbolt 3 USB-C supports video signals, data transfers at up to 40 Gbps, and Power Delivery provides up to 60 W of power to external devices
ASUS ProArt Calibration technology features a 14-bit look-up table (LUT), uniformity compensation and the ability to save colour profiles on the monitor

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars489 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
